# searchResultsUpdater

**Instance Property**

The object responsible for updating the contents of the search results controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var searchResultsUpdater: (any UISearchResultsUpdating)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Assign an object that adopts the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchResultsUpdating] protocol. Use the methods of that protocol to search your content and deliver the results to your search results view controller. The object contained by the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchController/searchResultsUpdater] property is often the view controller that’s set during initialization.

## Managing the search results

- **searchBar**: The search bar to install in your interface.
- **searchResultsController**: The view controller that displays the results of the search.
- **isActive**: The presented state of the search interface.
